quotes.author: Julia Child
quotes.quote: Cooking is like love. It should be entered into with abandon or not at all.

quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay
quotes.quote: The only time to eat diet food is while you're waiting for the steak to cook.

quotes.author: James Beard
quotes.quote: Good bread is the most fundamentally satisfying of all foods; and good bread with fresh butter, the greatest of feasts.

quotes.author: Julie Powell
quotes.quote: You can't eat just one dumpling. Well, you can, but you may regret it afterward.

quotes.author: Paul Prudhomme
quotes.quote: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.

quotes.author: Anthony Bourdain
quotes.quote: Your body is not a temple, it's an amusement park. Enjoy the ride.

quotes.author: Alice Waters
quotes.quote: This is the power of gathering: it inspires us, delightfully, to be more hopeful, more joyful, more thoughtful: in a word, more alive.

quotes.author: Thomas Keller
quotes.quote: A recipe has no soul. You, as the cook, must bring soul to the recipe.

quotes.author: Julia Child
quotes.quote: The only real stumbling block is fear of failure. In cooking, you've got to have a what-the-hell attitude.

quotes.author: Alton Brown
quotes.quote: Good food is very often, even most often, simple food.

quotes.author: Guy Fieri
quotes.quote: Cooking is all about people. Food is maybe the only universal thing that really has the power to bring everyone together.

quotes.author: Gordon Ramsay
quotes.quote: Cooking is about passion, so it may look slightly temperamental in a way that it’s too assertive to the naked eye.

quotes.author: Nigella Lawson
quotes.quote: Cooking is actually quite aggressive and controlling and sometimes, yes, there is an element of force-feeding going on.

quotes.author: Mario Batali
quotes.quote: The best way to execute French cooking is to get good and loaded and whack the hell out of a chicken. Bon appétit.

quotes.author: Wolfgang Puck
quotes.quote: I believe that cooking is an art, like painting, or writing a song. Just as there are only so many notes or colors, there are only so many flavors - it's how you combine them that sets you apart.

quotes.author: Ina Garten
quotes.quote: I think that you can make people feel good about themselves, confident and happy, and just feel great about life with good food.

quotes.author: Emeril Lagasse
quotes.quote: I wouldn't want any other job in the world. It's the greatest job there is. You get to play with food all day long.

quotes.author: Julia Child
quotes.quote: I think careful cooking is love, don't you? The loveliest thing you can cook for someone who's close to you is about as nice a valentine as you can give.

quotes.author: Ferran Adrià
quotes.quote: The more you know, the more you realize you know nothing. Every day I learn something new about cooking.

quotes.author: Jamie Oliver
quotes.quote: What's my favorite dish? I'm not going to pick a favorite dish. I'm like a parent. I can't pick a favorite child.
